SingleColumn.Condition:
from decisionhistory select current (not(decisiontype in ('Order', 'Create', 'ResetReservation'))
-- do not display an empty reason field if there is a UID_QERJustification and ( not(isnullorempty(reasonhead)) or isnullorempty(uid_qerjustification) ))

SingleColumn.Caption: translate("#LDS#By")
SingleColumn.Condition: from decisionhistory select current ( not(isnullorempty(displaypersonhead)) and decisiontype in ('Direct', 'Escalate', 'Query', 'Answer', 'Unsubscribe', 'Grant', 'Dismiss', 'Reject', 'Unsubscribe', 'Prolongate' , 'Order', 'RecallQuery', 'ResetReservation', 'Cancel') )
from DecisionHistory select current (not(IsNullOrEmpty(uid_pwodecisionrule)) and rulerlevel<>2)
from decisionhistory select current ( (decisiontype in ( 'AddInsteadOf', 'AddAdditional', 'Deny')) AND (IsNullOrEmpty(UID_PersonHead,'')<>''))
from decisionhistory select current ( (decisiontype in ('Query', 'AddInsteadOf', 'AddAdditional')) AND (IsNullOrEmpty(UID_PersonRelated,'')<>''))
SingleColumn.Caption: if((from decisionhistory select current decisiontype) = 'Query') then Translate("#LDS#Recipient") else DataCaption("Pwodecisionhistory", "uid_personrelated")

Function.Name: GetDecisionTypeColor(string decisiontype)
GetDecisionTypeCssClass(string decisiontype)
Function.Expression: if(decisiontype="dismiss") then "imx-negative" else if(decisiontype="reset") then "imx-info" else if(decisiontype="Escalate") then "imx-info" else if(decisiontype="reject") then "imx-negative" else if(decisiontype="grant") then "imx-positive" else if(decisiontype="Create") then "imx-info" else if(decisiontype="Order") then "imx-info" else if(decisiontype="Reaction") then "imx-info" else if(decisiontype="cancel") then "imx-negative" else if(decisiontype="prolongate") then "imx-info" else if(decisiontype="query") then "imx-question" else if(decisiontype="unsubscribe") then "imx-negative" else if(decisiontype="answer") then "imx-info" else if(decisiontype="recall") then "imx-info" else "imx-info"
